name: License For Envato
author: Ashraful Sarkar

sections.description:
Are you a theme or plugin developer and selling your product in the Envato market? Can’t manage your product license? If all questions are yes. This plugin help you. Now you can manage all Envato licenses with this plugin.

⚡ Features

  • Easy installation
  • License management
  • Search with purchasecode
  • Lightweight and fast
sections.installation:
Installation procedure:

  1. Deactivate plugin if you have the previous version installed.
  2. Extract “license-envato.zip” archive content to the “/wp-content/plugins/license-envato” directory.
  3. Activate “License For Envato” plugin via ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress admin menu.
  4. Go to the “License For Envato”-“Settings” menu item and setup Envato token.
  5. For More Documentation “License For Envato”-“Documentation” menu.
sections.faq:
How do I setup this plugin?

  • To setup the plugin, go to wp-admin > License Envato > Settings

Where can I report bugs or contribute to the project?

  • Bugs can be reported either in our support forum or preferably on the License Envato GitHub repository.
